properties.name: turing.ai.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable AI features including generative AI and semantic search capabilities.

properties.name: turing.allowedOrigins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins for cross-origin requests.

properties.name: turing.elasticsearch.timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds for Elasticsearch operations.

properties.name: turing.keycloak
properties.description: Enable or disable Keycloak integration for authentication and authorization.

properties.name: turing.mongodb.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable MongoDB integration for data persistence.

properties.name: turing.mongodb.logging.database
properties.description: MongoDB database name used for storing application logs.

properties.name: turing.mongodb.uri
properties.description: MongoDB connection URI string (e.g., mongodb://localhost:27017).

properties.name: turing.multi-tenant
properties.description: Enable or disable multi-tenant mode for supporting multiple isolated tenants.

properties.name: turing.open-browser
properties.description: Automatically open the default web browser on application startup.

properties.name: turing.openai.key
properties.description: OpenAI API key for accessing generative AI and LLM services.

properties.name: turing.search.cache.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable caching for search query results.

properties.name: turing.search.cache.ttl.seconds
properties.description: Time-to-live in seconds for cached search results before expiration.

properties.name: turing.search.engine.type
properties.description: Search engine type to use (e.g., 'solr', 'elasticsearch').

properties.name: turing.search.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable collection of search performance metrics.

properties.name: turing.solr.cloud
properties.description: Enable SolrCloud mode for distributed search across multiple nodes.

properties.name: turing.solr.commit.within
properties.description: Maximum time in milliseconds before a soft commit is triggered in Solr.

properties.name: turing.solr.timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds for Solr operations.

properties.name: turing.url
properties.description: Base URL of the Turing application (e.g., http://localhost:2700).

properties.name: turing.solr.commit.enabled
properties.description: A description for 'turing.solr.commit.enabled'

properties.name: turing.jms.concurrency
properties.description: A description for 'turing.jms.concurrency'
